text: The Magpie () is a 1958 Soviet drama movie directed by Naum Trakhtenberg.Телезрители увидят Дмитрия Певцова в новом образеСОРОКА-ВОРОВКА It stars Zinaida Kirienko, Nikolai Afanasyev, and Vladimir Pokrovskiy. == Actors == * Zinaida Kirienko as Aneta * Nikolai Afanasyev as Shchepin (as N. Afanasyev) * Vladimir Pokrovskiy as Knyaz (as V. Pokrovskiy) * Viktor Korshunov as Stepan (as V. Korshunov) * Anatoliy Kubatskiy as Ugryumov (as A. Kubatskiy) * Sergei Kalinin as Upravlyayushchiy (as S. Kalinin) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Naum Trakhtenberg
title: The Magpie (movie)
